name: After (Hyper Drive Gaming Studio)
description:
THIS IS A PRE-ORDER Receive an exclusive piece of art!  Get the special edition and get access to the test build!

20 years after the fall of the U.S, An ill man led by a mysterious woman must travel cross country to find a cure in a secluded city state run by oligarchs.

1. Movement - WASD + Mouse

2. Crouch - Left CTRL

3. Open Player Menu - Tab

4. Use Pistol - 2

5. Pause - Escape
